author: Mark Abeles-Allison
text:
We used clickers for a recent county board planning meeting.  We usually do voice votes.  The clickers work by requiring all board members to vote before the results are shown.  Once everyone has voted the results for each question are tabulated instantly and shown on the screen.
Does anyone use these for regular board meetings and votes?
Thanks.
title: Using Clickers for Board Meetings
